DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect oral Phytoestrogen Isosorbid mononitrate N-acetyl cysteine adjuvant clomiphene citrate induction ovulation pregnancy outcomes patient PCOS . In three-arm open RCT , 240 PCOS infertile woman randomly divide 3 group induction ovulation . Group A , [ PE group , n= 80 ] patient receive CC 100mg/d plus oral Phytoestrogen120 mg/ day patient Group B , [ ISMN group , n=80 ] receive CC 100 mg/d plus 20 mg Isosorbid mononitrate Group C , [ NAC group , n=80 ] patient receive CC 100 mg/d plus NAC 1200 mg/day .
DOC.brief_title: Phytoestrogen , NO Donors , N-acetyl Cysteine Add Therapy Clomiphene Citrate Improve Pregnancy Rate PCO Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . All patient PCOS . 2 . All patient receive CC 100 mg/day 5 day start day 5 successful ovulation document folliculometry midluteal serum progesterone pregnancy achieve . 3 . All patient patent fallopian tube Hysterosalpingography . 4 . Their husband normal semen analysis accord modify criterion WHO . 5 . All patient normal serum prolactin thyroid profile . 6 . Any patient vaginitis treat start induction . 1 . Other cause infertility anovulation . 2 . Diabetes endocrinological disorder . 3 . Age > 40 year . 4 . Smoking . 5 . Alcohol use . 6 . Presence ovarian cyst > 2cm second day cycle . 7 . Patients receive gonadotrophin preceeding 6 month . 8 . Patients do unilateral bilateral ovarian drilling . 9 . Allergy PE , NO donor NAC
